hero.title: About Green Desertt
hero.intro: Green Desert is a Saudi Arabian biotechnology startup founded in January 2020. We address the region's most pressing environmental challenges through innovative, sustainable solutions rooted in Cannabis sativa (industrial hemp), aligned with Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030.

columns: Green Desert became Saudi Arabia's first licensed industrial hemp solutions company, born to support giga-project ambitions with regenerative materials, local supply chains, and Vision 2030 compliance.

Green Desert is a Saudi Arabian biotechnology startup founded in January 2020. We address the region's most pressing environmental challenges through innovative, sustainable solutions rooted in industrial hemp.
We combine science, policy, and industry execution to prove hemp's role in the region's sustainability transition.

vision.title: Committed roadmap to 2030
vision.body: Our initiatives contribute to quality-of-life, environmental protection, and economic diversification goals. We collaborate with government stakeholders and industry partners to deploy scalable solutions that deliver tangible impact across Saudi cities and regions.

phases.title: 2020 • License secured
phases.body: Green Desert founded and awarded the first Saudi license for industrial hemp research and deployment.
details: MEWA and SFDA approvals formalized the national industrial hemp research framework.
Internal governance, lab partnerships, and compliance reporting protocols were established.

phases.title: 2021 • Pilot validation
phases.body: Completed controlled-environment trials demonstrating 7.8 tonnes of CO₂ sequestration per hectare.

phases.title: 2022 • Mega-project pilots
phases.body: Signed proof-of-concept deployments with NEOM-aligned and Red Sea corridor developments.
details: Demonstrated structural and environmental KPIs within giga project testbeds across desert climates.
Codified HSSE and construction SOPs with multidisciplinary engineering and materials teams.

phases.title: 2024 • GCC expansion
phases.body: Launched regional partnerships across GCC and initiated African feasibility studies with public-sector partners.
details: Signed GCC MoUs covering logistics, procurement, and bilingual deployment support.
Rolled out digital carbon-accounting dashboards and ministerial reporting kits.

phases.title: 2026 • Public-private delivery
phases.body: Commissioning carbon-negative material packages for municipal housing, transport, and utilities programs in Riyadh and the Eastern Province.
details: Delivered turnkey material suites for municipal housing, transit, and utilities mandates.
Scaled training hubs so public-private delivery teams share unified playbooks.

phases.title: 2028 • Export-ready processing
phases.body: Bringing an integrated agro-industrial campus online to supply certified hemp inputs across MENA and Africa with audited traceability.
details: Commissioned an integrated agro-industrial campus with accredited QA and traceability labs.
Activated bonded logistics corridors to serve MENA and African partners with certified biomaterials.

phases.title: 2030 • Vision 2030 outcomes
phases.body: Fully embedded hemp circularity across giga projects, delivering local biomaterials, verified carbon credits, and future-proof jobs for the Green Saudi vision.
details: Achieved full hemp circularity across giga assets with independently verified carbon offsets.
Graduated Saudi suppliers and SMEs into the Green Saudi marketplace with long-term jobs.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: We aim to break the vicious cycle of desertification, water scarcity, and soil degradation with practical, scalable solutions. Our biotechnology-driven products and services reduce waste, turn byproducts into value, and power a greener circular economy across the Kingdom.
mission.subtitle: We combine science, policy, and industry execution to prove hemp's role in the region's sustainability transition.

values.title: Our values
values.subtitle: These operating principles guide how we collaborate with government, private sector innovators, and communities across the region.

items.title: Regulatory pioneers
items.body: Licensed to deploy hemp-based systems under Saudi environmental frameworks while shaping new guidelines alongside ministries and giga-project owners.

items.title: Science-led impact
items.body: Data, field trials, and lifecycle analysis prove measurable CO₂ sequestration, water efficiency, and material performance for our partners.

items.title: Partnership-first delivery
items.body: We co-design solutions with developers, engineers, and financiers to de-risk adoption and accelerate scale.
